formattedAddress: 39w W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 39w W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: המלון במקום מרכזי והצוות מאוד אדיב, אבל החדרים מאוד קטנים, לא מסדרים את החדרים בכלל, לכן גם לא מפנים זבל מהחדר ולא מחליפים מגבות, אומרים שזה בגלל הקורונה ורק אם מבקשים מנקים- ביקשנו ולא ניקו

text.text: The hotel is in a central location and the staff is very kind, but the rooms are very small, they don't tidy the rooms at all, that's why they don't remove garbage from the room and don't change towels, they say it's because of the corona virus, and only if you ask for cleaners - we asked and they didn't clean

originalText.text: המלון הכי גרוע ששהיתי בו EVER. לא מנקים חדרים ולא מחליפים מגבות גם כשמבקשים, קיבלנו חדר ללא מושב אסלה וחיכינו שעות עד שעשו לנו טובה ומצאו מושב מחדר אחר, צוות לא מקצועי חצוף ולא אדיב. ביקשתי ממנהל המלון כתובת מייל להגיש תלונה - לא טרחו לענות למייל ונראה שנתן בכוונה כתובת מפוברקת. המיקום הטוב לא מפצה על שירות גרוע מאוד !!! מומלץ להתרחק !!!

text.text: The worst hotel I have ever stayed in. Rooms are not cleaned and towels are not changed even when requested, we got a room without a toilet seat and waited for hours until they did us a favor and found a seat from another room, unprofessional rude and unkind staff. I asked the hotel manager for an email address to file a complaint - they didn't bother to answer the email and it seems that he intentionally gave a fabricated address. The good location does not compensate for very bad service!!! It is recommended to stay away!!!

originalText.text: Quartos com decoração moderna e de super bom gosto. Tem cofre, frigobar, microondas, ar condicionado quente e frio, maquina de cafe e tv grande com canais a cabo. Camas confortáveis, quarto extremamente silencioso e  lençóis e toalhas impecavelmente limpas. O hotel, como todos os outros, está com serviços limitados por causa do covid, mas pedi toalhas extras e me trouxeram um kit completo de reposição: toalhas, xampu, sabonete, papel higiênico, etc. A localização é fantástica, perto de tudo!

text.text: Rooms with modern and tasteful decor. It has a safe, minibar, microwave, hot and cold air conditioning, coffee machine and large TV with cable channels. Comfortable beds, extremely quiet room and impeccably clean sheets and towels. The hotel, like all others, has limited services due to Covid, but I asked for extra towels and they brought me a complete replacement kit: towels, shampoo, soap, toilet paper, etc. The location is fantastic, close to everything!

originalText.text:
Kétszer vonták le a szállás díjat, nem takarítanak, rossz a lift! Hideg van!
Ehhez képest nagyon drága!

text.text:
They deducted the accommodation fee twice, they don't clean, the elevator is bad! It's cold!
Very expensive compared to that!

originalText.text: Lamentable. Difícilmente superable la mala gestión de este hotel. De entrada su dirección en Google es incorrecta. Imagino que para evitar las merecidas críticas. Tres noches, ni una sola vez limpiaron la habitación. No había jabón en la ducha. No había vasos para el café, la cafetera rota. No tenía pilas la caja fuerte. No había recambio de papel higiénico. No había mantas ni calefacción central (a cero grados en la calle). Te tocaba poner en marcha una máquina de calor de aire que hacía un ruido como una locomotora y no había quien durmiera. 10 minutos de espera promedio de espera para los ascensores. Las puertas giratorias se atascaban y averiaban con frecuencia, y apenas espacio en el guardarropas. Estrepitoso. Nunca vi nada igual a 250 euros la noche.

text.text: Regrettable. The poor management of this hotel can hardly be overcome. To begin with, your address on Google is incorrect. I imagine that to avoid deserved criticism. Three nights, not once did they clean the room. There was no soap in the shower. There were no glasses for coffee, the coffee pot was broken. The safe didn't have batteries. There was no replacement of toilet paper. There were no blankets or central heating (zero degrees outside). You had to start an air heat machine that made a noise like a locomotive and no one slept. 10 minute average wait for elevators. The revolving doors frequently jammed and broke down, and there was hardly any closet space. Loud. I have never seen anything equal to 250 euros a night.
